title: 修改cfg文件后的errored问题
author: mccrow2017
txt_content:
下了一个 guardian chests的mod，在其cfg文件夹中，尝试修改它的两行涉及等级要求的参数：

    I:levelCostBoundMapTier1=10
    I:levelCostGuardianTier1=1


我将 10 和 1 分别置换成 0 后，保存再运行游戏，结果这个修改的文件自动被变为 errored 文件，而config文件夹又新建了一个cfg文件，参数与未修改前一样。请问上述问题如何解决？

replies.author: GiNYAi
replies.txt_content:
稍微试验了一下 这个问题和你修改的部分无关
如果你的语言设置成英语(美国)的话
生成的正常的配置文件应该是
# Configuration file

"equipment damage" {
    # Worn equipment will suffer this damage if user dies: (default = 10, 0 to disable)
    D:applyDamageOnEquip=10.0

    # Is the damage informed a percentage of total item durability (by default: if true, a 30 durability item will suffer 3 durability, if false it will suffer 10 durability)? (default = true)
    B:damageOnEquipPercentage=true
}


general {
    # If no item is required to spawn a chest on death (requireGuardianIdol=false), setting this to true makes the chest act as a Bound Guardian Chest and spawns it nearby your respawn point (default = false)
    B:defaultsToTier2=false

    # Should the Guardian Chest warn of its coordinates? (default = true)
    B:informCoords=true

    # Level cost to bind an Unbound Map: (default: 10)
    I:levelCostBoundMapTier1=10

    # Level cost to awaken a Inert Guardian Chest: (default: 1)
    I:levelCostGuardianTier1=1

    # When the Guardian Chest's spawn point is blocked, it will spawn at the closest free spot within this radius, in blocks: (default: 5)
    I:maxRadiusToSearchForAFreeSpot=5

    # Is a Awakened Guardian Chest required to save items to chests on death? (default: true)
    B:requireGuardianIdol=true

    # Should a  return to the saved inventory after death? Also returns an Unbound Map if the chest was a bound one. (default = true)
    B:returnChestToInventory=true

    # Time in seconds after death while a Guardian Chest will only drop items for his owner: (default = 300, set 0 to disable security)
    I:timeBeforeUnsecure=300
}


"soulbound equipment" {
    # Keep all enchanted items in inventory after death (false will keep only Soulbound - enderIO, ArsMagicka2 - ones)? (default: false)
    B:anyEnchantSoulBinds=false

    # Force all non-soulbound items to drop on death (some mods hold inventory items by default) (default: true)
    B:makeAllItemsDrop=true
}复制代码
mod作者在注释和节点名中引用了翻译emmmmm 由于没有中文翻译所以产生了这样的bug 
我比较懒从mod的jar中\assets\guardianchest\lang\ 
把en_US.lang复制出来 改成zh_CN.lang扔回去 似乎就没有问题了

我改过参数的文件：

# Configuration file

 {
    B:anyEnchantSoulBinds=false
    D:applyDamageOnEquip=10.0
    B:damageOnEquipPercentage=true
    B:defaultsToTier2=false
    B:informCoords=true
    I:levelCostBoundMapTier1=0
    I:levelCostGuardianTier1=0
    B:makeAllItemsDrop=true
    I:maxRadiusToSearchForAFreeSpot=5
    B:requireGuardianIdol=true
    B:returnChestToInventory=true
    I:timeBeforeUnsecure=300
}

改过的地方标红了，简单来说就是把里面的等级要求降为 0，然后加载后出现贴中的情形.
